contacts.title: Contact Me
contacts.subtitle: Open to new opportunities or just want to chat?

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: My experience with various technologies* and frameworks*
skills.disclamer: * Skill ratings are approximate and subjective; actual proficiency may vary.

projects.name: **Project: Portal for UNITY/WEBGL games**
projects.description: A comprehensive gaming platform that provides seamless integration of Unity and WebGL games with advanced user management and payment processing.
responsibilities: * Led a development team of 3 (2 frontend, 1 backend) as a team lead, including task allocation and development process management.
* Developed and optimized the backend to ensure high performance and scalability.
* Supported frontend developers implementing business logic in React and optimized client–server interaction.
* Integrated with a payment gateway to enable secure and reliable transactions.
* Set up CI/CD pipelines for automated production deployments, reducing time-to-market.

projects.name: **Project: Telegram WebApp game/application (NDA)**
responsibilities: * Designed and developed a high-load backend to support complex gameplay scenarios and interactions in a Telegram WebApp.
* Optimized PostgreSQL performance, introduced indexing, and wrote complex queries to minimize latency.
* Set up and maintained caching with Redis to reduce load and improve app responsiveness.
* Integrated with the Telegram API.
* Implemented CI/CD pipelines in GitLab, accelerating delivery to production.

projects.name: **Project: CRM for a website builder**
responsibilities: * Developed and integrated new modules to extend CRM capabilities.
* Identified and fixed bugs, improving system stability.
* Integrated with Kubernetes to ensure scalability and container management.
* Wrote tests with Jest to increase code reliability.
* Optimized legacy code for performance and maintainability.

projects.name: **Project: App for manual and automated API testing (Postman‑like)**
responsibilities: * Designed the database structure for optimal app performance.
* Developed APIs to enable interaction between system components.
* Worked with a microservices architecture to improve flexibility and scalability.
* Set up CI/CD processes for automated build and deployment.
* Detected and fixed bugs to improve product quality.

projects.name: **Project: Online store**
responsibilities: * Developed and maintained the website.
* Built internal tools for business operations.

data.details: Provided technical maintenance and support for 5+ computers.

data.position: Business Owner (auto parts store / Yandex.Taxi franchise)
data.details: Built and grew a business from scratch to successful operation. Gained experience in accounting and business management, and learned key aspects of Russian tax and labor law.
Gained sales experience with a network provider’s products, including internet services, cable TV, and set‑top boxes. Trained in cold‑calling techniques.

hobbies.name: Hobbies & Interests
hobbies.value: I read professional literature and build several pet projects from scratch. I also develop in different areas, which keeps me motivated to learn and improve.

recommendations.title: References
recommendations.information: References from ‘VTEK’ are available upon formal employment.

elements.spec: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon RX 580

cta.title: Let’s Work Together
cta.subtitle: I’m always interested in new opportunities and challenging projects. Feel free to reach out if you’d like to discuss potential collaboration.
